request.description:
### Add to Cart

This endpoint allows the user to add items to their cart.

#### Request Body

- `userId` (string, required): The ID of the user.
- `products` (array, required): An array of objects containing the `dishId` (string, required) and `quantity` (integer, required) of each product to be added to the cart.
- `totalPrice` (integer, required): The total price of the items in the cart.
    

#### Response Body

The response will include the updated cart details.

exec: // set the value of the "id" variable to a collection variable also called "id".
